description.en:
Karin Kiritani is a third-year student at the Hoshizakura High School who is also a pitcher for the women's hard baseball club. She dreams about one day making it to the Koishen stadium. During the spring tournament, she looses to Mirei Hiragi of the Kyoto Miyabi Highschool.  
  
Determined to make it, she practices under the guidance of her childhood friend, Daimon Rai. But can Karin really make it to the stadium of her dreams?  
  
This series was created to support women and girls in baseball as well as getting more interested in the sport. It started as a web comic published that was published back in 2016. It later got a physical release that ran from 2017 - 2019. They have also published a newer version of the volumes.
___
**Additional Links:**
- [X](https://x.com/karin_mound)
- [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBVng3g1EdB_WOcSH8V445g)
